help_support.title: Help & Support
help_support.description: Our support team is available to assist you with any questions or issues you may have. Choose one of the contact options below or browse our FAQ section.
help_support.chat_description: Start a live chat with our support team

onboarding.profile_setup_subtitle: Let us know a little bit about you
onboarding.select_location_error: Please select your country and city
onboarding.verification_details: We're verifying your details and setting up your account. This may take a few moments.
onboarding.account_ready: Your account has been successfully verified and is now ready to use.
onboarding.consultation_description: Secure your appointment and access personalized care from a leading specialist.
onboarding.terms_agreement_prefix: By proceeding, you agree to our
onboarding.benefit_expertise_subtitle: Consultation with a distinguished Urologist & Surgeon with 30+ years of experience.
onboarding.benefit_privacy_subtitle: Your consultation call and follow-up messages are fully encrypted and confidential.
onboarding.benefit_consultation_subtitle: Includes a detailed video call and convenient follow-up via secure messaging.
onboarding.benefit_care_subtitle: Dedicated attention tailored to your needs, accessible from home.
onboarding.no_documents_now: I don't have documents right now
onboarding.document_desc_lab: Blood tests, urine analysis, PSA levels, kidney function tests, etc.
onboarding.document_desc_imaging: X-ray, CT, MRI, or Ultrasound reports (especially kidneys, bladder, prostate).
onboarding.document_desc_consultation: Summaries or letters from other doctors, especially urologists.
onboarding.document_desc_surgical: Details about past urological surgeries or procedures you have had.
onboarding.document_desc_pathology: Results from biopsies or tissue analysis.
onboarding.document_picking_disabled: Document picking is temporarily disabled. Please use photo upload instead.
onboarding.tell_us_medical_history: Tell us about your medical history
onboarding.medical_history_description: This information helps our specialists provide better care for you.
onboarding.any_conditions: Do you have any of these conditions?

permissions.ios_reset_instruction: Please go to Privacy & Settings, find this app, and toggle the required permissions on.
permissions.microphone_required_message:
Voice messages require microphone access. Please enable it in your device settings.

Go to Settings > Privacy > Microphone > UroCenter
permissions.photos_required_message: Saving images requires access to your photo library. Please enable it in your device settings.

terms.ai_disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is sample text generated by AI. It is NOT a substitute for professional legal advice. Consult with a qualified legal professional to ensure compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.introduction_content: Welcome to the UroCenter mobile application (the "App"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the App and its related services provided by UroCenter ("we", "us", or "our"). By downloading, accessing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App.
terms.use_content_1: The App is intended to provide general information about urological health, our services, appointment scheduling capabilities, and potentially communication features. It is not intended to provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this App.
terms.use_content_2: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for ensuring that your use of the App complies with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.
terms.accounts_content: Certain features of the App may require you to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password, and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or password.
terms.intellectual_content: The App and its entire contents, features, and functionality (including but not limited to all information, software, text, displays, images, video, and audio, and the design, selection, and arrangement thereof) are owned by UroCenter, its licensors, or other providers of such material and are protected by copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.
terms.disclaimers_content: THE APP AND ITS CONTENT ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS, WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. UROCENTER HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE FOREGOING DOES NOT AFFECT ANY WARRANTIES THAT CANNOT BE EXCLUDED OR LIMITED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW.
terms.liability_content: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PROVIDED BY LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL UROCENTER, ITS AFFILIATES, OR THEIR LICENSORS, SERVICE PROVIDERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, OFFICERS, OR DIRECTORS BE LIABLE FOR DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, UNDER ANY LEGAL THEORY, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE, OR INABILITY TO USE, THE APP, ANY WEBSITES LINKED TO IT, ANY CONTENT ON THE APP OR SUCH OTHER WEBSITES, INCLUDING ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PERSONAL INJURY, PAIN AND SUFFERING, EMOTIONAL DISTRESS, LOSS OF REVENUE, LOSS OF PROFITS, LOSS OF BUSINESS OR ANTICIPATED SAVINGS, LOSS OF USE, LOSS OF GOODWILL, LOSS OF DATA, AND WHETHER CAUSED BY TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), BREACH OF CONTRACT, OR OTHERWISE, EVEN IF FORESEEABLE.
terms.law_content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Iraq without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision or rule.
terms.changes_content: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our App after any revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at info@urocenter.com.
